Summary: object went east to west, horison to horison in 1 sec, left green trail in sky for 2 to 3 sec., 4 witnesses to the event
divs: Sighting Detailsin 1973,july or aug. in niles il.,three of my friends and i were star watching laying on the ground, face up looking at the sky. in 1 second something streeked from west horison to east horison and left a green trail that stayed illuminated for 2 to 3 seconds in its flight path, no noise at all. unknown mach speed. it went that fast. did not see any craft because of the speed it traveled. it had to be in earth atmospere, 10,000 to 100,000 feet high i figure. it was not in space. i have never seen anything that fast since in my life. all 4 of us saw it, all 4 said what was it, got very freeked and had no idea of what we had just seen. we did figure we had seen a ufo.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Niles
This sighting has never been favorited.
